name: L-G-Bee-T +
description:
Fly about, match the colours and make the flags! Part of Squiggly River's Pride Month Jam!

Colours must be exact (light green vs darker green, etc). To change the current flag, fly into the "Flag Reset" zone in the bottom-right and press either button!

https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=34608
